availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Lancaster (Marion County, Kentucky, surveyor and farmer)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, surveyor and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Lancaster and Ellen L. Lancaster. Married to Martina R. Smith Lancaster in Marion County on September 25, 1860. Father of M. Lancaster, Lilly Lancaster, Kate Lancaster. Surveyor in Marion County in 1860. Farmer in Marion County in 1870.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, p. 723.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, p. 26.
Find A Grave, "George Lancaster (October 4, 1835-July 6, 1873)," Memorial #26701135, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26701135 (accessed February 4, 2019).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Marion County Marriages, Film #000482709, p. 15.
